docs.lead_paragraph: Movements of vessels follow, all dates are Aug. 3, unless specified: Dahlgren to Newport: Badger, Decatur.' Fairfax, Herbert, Leary, J. F. Talbott. Manila to sea, July 30: Canopus, Pigeon, .Stewart, S-36; 37, 38, 39, 40, 41. At San Francisco: Chester, Chicago, Indianapolis, Mindanao, Northampton, Quincy. Salt Lake City.

docs.snippet: The almost unanimous support of the Spanish Nationalist [Insurgent] cause by Catholic ecclesiastics throughout the world is indicated in a book to be published soon at Burgos, it was learned by this correspondent during a recently concluded visit 'to...
docs.lead_paragraph: The almost unanimous support of the Spanish Nationalist [Insurgent] cause by Catholic ecclesiastics throughout the world is indicated in a book to be published soon at Burgos, it was learned by this correspondent during a recently concluded visit 'to Rebel Spain.
docs.abstract: Vatican approves book to be pub in Burgos as sequel to 1937 pastoral lr; foreword written in form of lr to Card Goma by Card Pacelli; N Y Times commended for printing whole text of pastoral lr

headline.main: WORLD CATHOLICS UNITED FOR FRANCO; Vatican Approves Book to Be Published in Burgos Soon on Support of Hierarchy PASTORAL LETTER SEQUEL 50,000-Word Work Details the Solid Support Received by Rebels From Ecclesiastics Has Papal Approval Gives History of Letter Curia Cardinals Respond Sought o Avoid Rift Letter Not Printed In Britain Controversies Are Outlined Solidarity Is Called "Miracle"

byline.original: By JOHN V. HINKELSpecial Correspondence, THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Award of ten travel fellowships to scholastic representatives of ten Latin-American republics was announced yesterday by the Institute of International Education under a plan jointly sponsored by governmental and educational agencies and the Pan...
docs.lead_paragraph: Award of ten travel fellowships to scholastic representatives of ten Latin-American republics was announced yesterday by the Institute of International Education under a plan jointly sponsored by governmental and educational agencies and the Pan American Airways System.
docs.abstract: Inst of Internatl Educ announces 10 Latin-Amer travel fellowships sponsored by govt and educ agencies and Pan Amer Airways
